subtasks: Determine if a weed is noxious
Control weeds that affect cropping economics
Hang a warning sign near locked storage
Transport chemicals in an open area of the vehicle
Secure chemicals during transport to avoid loss
Supervise chemicals at all times to prevent theft or pranks
Ensure container labels are visible when handling or transporting
Use proper safety equipment when handling or transporting chemicals
Clean up chemical spills using appropriate absorbents
Report significant spills to the poison control center
Contact the local Extension office with questions
